meter_reading.notes: Odometer wheels are read as 02271.2 (the '2' is the rightmost black-digit wheel for tenths). The red needle on the circular dial is positioned between the implied 0.03 mark and the labeled 0.04 mark. Visually, it's approximately 70% of the way from 0.03 to 0.04, leading to an interpolated reading of 0.037. The '0.00' position is assumed at 12 o'clock, with values increasing clockwise.
